languages.text: "Боюсь, это невозможно, Лорд-капитан. Может быть, Равор и смог бы совершить подобный маневр... но сейчас нам остается только принять бой".
"I'm afraid that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps Ravor could have managed a manoeuvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is fight."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, это невозможно, Лорд-капитан. Может быть, Равор и смог бы совершить подобный маневр... но сейчас нам остается только принять бой".

traits.locale_text: "I'm afraid that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps Ravor could've managed a maneouvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is engage."
"I'm afraid that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps Ravor could've managed a maneouvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is engage."
"I'm afraid, that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps, Ravor could've managed a maneouvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is fight."
"I'm afraid, that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps, Ravor could've managed a maneouvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is fight."
"I'm afraid that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps Ravor could have managed a manoeuvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is fight."

languages.text: “这恐怕行不通，舰长大人。如果换做是雷沃，或许能执行这样的操作……但现在，我们只能全力一搏。”
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps Ravor could have managed a manoeuvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is fight."

traits.locale_text: “这恐怕行不通，舰长大人。如果换做是雷沃，或许能执行这样的操作……但现在，我们只能全力一搏。”

languages.text: « Je crains que ce soit impossible, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ravor aurait peut-être réussi une telle manœuvre, mais pour l'instant... notre seule option est l'affrontement. »
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid, that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps, Ravor could've managed a maneouvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is fight."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que ce soit impossible, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ravor aurait peut-être réussi une telle manœuvre, mais pour l'instant... notre seule option est l'affrontement. »

languages.text: "Ich fürchte nein, Lord Captain. Ein solches Manöver hätte Ravor vielleicht hinbekommen ... aber momentan bleibt uns nur übrig zu kämpfen."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid, that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps, Ravor could've managed a maneouvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is fight."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte nein, Lord Captain. Ein solches Manöver hätte Ravor vielleicht hinbekommen ... aber momentan bleibt uns nur übrig zu kämpfen."

languages.text: «Me temo que no es posible, Lord Capitán. Tal vez Ravor hubiese podido hacerlo, pero, ahora mismo, no nos queda otra que combatir».
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps Ravor could have managed a manoeuvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is fight."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que no es posible, Lord Capitán. Tal vez Ravor hubiese podido hacerlo, pero, ahora mismo, no nos queda otra que combatir».

languages.text: 「残念ながら、それは不可能です、ロード・キャプテン。おそらくラヴォールならその手のマネができたでしょうが…今は戦うしかありません」
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps Ravor could have managed a manoeuvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is fight."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながら、それは不可能です、ロード・キャプテン。おそらくラヴォールならその手のマネができたでしょうが…今は戦うしかありません」

languages.text: "Korkarım bu imkânsız Lord Kaptan. Ravor olsa öyle bir manevrayı yapabilirdi belki ama... Şimdi elimizden ancak savaşmak gelir."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid that's impossible, Lord Captain. Perhaps Ravor could have managed a manoeuvre of that sort... but right now, all we can do is fight."
